entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
